name: Blinded
description: Fails checks that require sight. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Creature has disadvantage when attacking.

name: Charmed
description: Can't attack the charmer. Charmer has advantage on social ability checks.

name: Frightened
description: Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls against the source of its fear. Can't willingly moved closer to the source of its fear.

name: Frozen
description: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically Dexterity saving throws. Unless otherwise stated, lasts 1 turn.

name: Grappled
description: Speed becomes 0. Ends if grappler becomes incapacitated or an effect removes the grappler beyond melee range of the creature.

name: Invisible
description: Impossible to see without special gadgets. The creature still makes noise and tracks. Attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage. The creature has advantage on attack rolls.

name: Lifted
description: Restrained. A lifted target has no mass, lifted into the air by a temporary mass effect field. Thus, a lifted creature can be pushed, pulled, or otherwise manipulated for varying results.

name: Paralyzed
description: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Any attack that hits made within melee range (2m) is a critical hit.

name: Petrified
description: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Resistance to all damage. Immune to poison and disease.

name: Poisoned
description: Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

name: Prone
description: Can crawl. Condition ends if the creature stands up (takes 1/2 movement). Has disadvantage on attack rolls. Attacks against the creature made within 2m have advantage, beyond 2m disadvantage.

name: Restrained
description: Speed becomes 0. Attack rolls have disadvantage. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

name: Stunned
description: Incapacitated. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.

name: Unconscious
description: Incapacitated. Drops any weapons. Fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Any attack within 2m that hits is a critical hit.
